title: Google surprisingly talks augmented reality glasses at I/O 2022, starting with AR translation tease
content:

description: To close out I/O 2022, Sundar Pichai very surprising previewed Google’s upcoming augmented reality efforts for glasses.  The first use case Google described is augmented reality glasses for translation where people see a live transcript in their line of sight.
